Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Cicero
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted WB: 87th, Pulaski & 81st; EB 81st, Pulaski & 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, Pulaski and 81st.

Eastbound buses will operate via 81st, Pulaski and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Homan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Homan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Homan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Logan Square
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
